compiler.name: name of the compiler (specified in orzoj-judge config)
compiler.opt: additional option (like -O2 for gcc) ($DATA is the problem data directory)

verifier.source: compile and/or execute the verifier from source. lang must exist in the configuration file of the judge

orzoj-prob-conf.extra: extra input file to be copied from data directory

case.input: standard input file name (must be in the problem data directory)
case.mem: integer, memory limit in kb (0 means do not limit)
